Docs > Installation

Installation

Docusaurus is essentially a set of npm packages that can be installed over npm. This guide covers how to install and configure Docusaurus for your documentation needs.

Requirements

You need Node.js version 18.0 or above.

npx create-docusaurus@latest my-website classic

Make sure you have the correct Node.js version before proceeding with the installation process.
